mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${fileSeriesStatTableName}( `fid` INTEGER, `sid` INTEGER, `min_timestamp` BIGINT NOT NULL, `max_timestamp` BIGINT NOT NULL, `count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `miss_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `special_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `late_count` INTEGER, `redundancy_count` INTEGER, `value_count` INTEGER, `variation_count` INTEGER, `speed_count` INTEGER, `acceleration_count` INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY(`fid`, `sid`), FOREIGN KEY(`fid`) REFERENCES ${fileTableName}(`fid`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY(`sid`) REFERENCES ${seriesTableName}(`sid`) ON DELETE CASCADE )
